metadata.title: CVE-2022-0791 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to 99.0.4844.51 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via user interactions.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
